attributes.action: Sack Alastair Darling over inland revenue loss of public databases of 25 million Britons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This Government must start being held to account in the same manner that the rest of nation is when dealing with data protection. This is the latest breech of the Data protection Act by  government agencies. Recently junior Drs details including sexual preferrence were posted on a website. Now it would seem that all UK families datails are out there.It is not enough to make the immediate revenue manager a convenient scapegoat, Alastair Darling must be accountable.This is incompetence that affects at least a third of the UK population! How much more does it take to get a minister to do the honorable thing?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
